greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The Partition Ruler
comment: a(k) = 1 if k = A000070(n) - 1 for some n >= 0 otherwise 0.
Is this the same as A134286? - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 02 2009
mathematica: a[k_] := AnyTrue[Range[0, k], k == a70[#]-1&] // Boole;
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Jan 31 2009
